title: ValueError in calculate_value when processing non-numeric input
body:
## Summary
The `calculate_value` function raises a ValueError when passed non-numeric string input.

## Traceback
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/app/src/main.py", line 42, in process_request
    result = calculate_value(data)
  File "/app/src/calculator.py", line 15, in calculate_value
    return int(value)
ValueError: invalid literal for int() with base 10: 'abc'
```

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Call `process_request` with string data
2. Error occurs

## Labels
- bug
- auto-triaged
author: auto-triage-bot

title: ConnectionError when user service is unavailable
body:
## Summary
The application fails with ConnectionError when the user service API is unreachable.

## Analysis
The HTTP client does not have proper retry logic for transient failures.
author: developer1
